<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 20"
    pfs=""
>
[The Lost](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2509)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Stolen Fate</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Artifact" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=253" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #191: The Destiny War](/Sources.aspx?ID=199) pg. 76</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** carried

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

_The Lost_ symbolizes loss of identity and a life filled with emptiness. As long as _The Lost_ is invested, you gain resistance to [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106) damage equal to your level.

<document level="2" id="action-2055" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: The Lost
